name: Agora (AdrienC)
description:
Unfinished turn-based board game made in DSK International campus around 2011. Altough currently unplayable and with a few bugs, you can still check out the tutorial to understand the basics and access the main board table.

made with Construct 2

Project Management - Nishant Shah
Art & Visual design - Akshay Sharma, Joachim aka Joc le Narvalo & Raphaël Dely
Game Design & Programming - Adrien Charneau
